title: Political stability - countries
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Index Value in the y axis.
Country Oman has the highest Index Value and Norway has the lowest Index Value.
The minimum Country Norway has got 3.25 times less Index Value than the maximum Country Oman.
min_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Index Value in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Index Value 3.9 is found at Country Oman and the minimum is found at Norway where Country is 1.2.

max_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Index Value in each Country on the y axis.
The Index Value is highest at Country Oman and lowest at Country Norway.
The highest Country Oman has 2.7 more Index Value than the lowest Country Norway.
Country Oman is higher than any other Countrys with value 3.9, followed by Slovenia, and Slovenia. Down to Country Norway with the lowest value 1.2.
Country Australia, Austria, Luxembourg, and New Zealand have a similar Index Value that is 3.6.
The Country Norway has 1.18 times less Index Value than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 56.4.
